sentences.sContent: They knelt before the image of Buddha.
sentences.sContent_eng: They knelt before the image of Buddha.

sentences.sContent: He has kept the figure of Buddha for luck.
sentences.sContent_eng: He has kept the figure of Buddha for luck.
sentences.sCn: 为了图吉利他一直保存着这尊佛像。

trans.tranOther: Buddha is the title given to Gautama Siddhartha, the religious teacher and founder of Buddhism
